arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim feels his team are on the right track ahead of Fulham clash
arts.sum: Fulham have not always been the easiest opponent for Manchester United to face, most recently knocking the Red Devils out of the FA Cup. Amorim highlighted the fact that the Cottagers are a tough team to play, also praising manager Marco Silva : Although Manchester United fell to a defeat against Arsenal in their opening game of the season, there were clear improvements on display all over the pitch for the Red Devils.
